subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Under Mark Nofri, who took over after 18 years as an assistant, Sacred Heart had its third 10-win season and reached the F.C.S. playoffs for the first time.
snippet: Under Mark Nofri, who took over after 18 years as an assistant, Sacred Heart had its third 10-win season and reached the F.C.S. playoffs for the first time.
